definitions.definition: Having a muscular physique , built ‘like a bull’.

examples: He was heavily criticised for his bullish behaviour.

definitions.definition: Optimistic ; overly or foolishly optimistic or hopeful .

labels: of the price of financial instruments
definitions.label_groups: stock market , of the price of financial instruments

main_definition: Having a muscular physique , built ‘like a bull’.
secondary_definitions: Optimistic ; overly or foolishly optimistic or hopeful .
( stock market , of the price of financial instruments ) Characterized by rising value.
